website_summaries.verdict: A set of two blind spot mirrors that also magnifies the scene behind your snowmobile.
pros: Circular blind spot mirrors that easily adhere to the side mirrors you already have installed
Magnification level in this blind spot mirror is 3 times, allowing you to see items behind you more clearly
The adhesive strip on this mirror set is extremely strong, and it will work nicely in cold weather during snowmobiling
cons: Takes up some space on your current mirrors
Smaller mirrors than you might expect

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility! Great for freeway driving, you can see everything!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of these mirrors that we've purchased; first for me, then my son, and now my husband. They are simple to install and don't budge in weather or heat. It is such a simple fix for such a big problem that I don't know why cars don't come with these types of mirrors automatically installed when they are made! Everyone who rides in my car asks me about them and several of them have purchased them, as well. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Dadjou

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but mediocre function.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this little mirror is good and it does stick well. Also the idea is good. But-- the image you see is small and sometimes misleading compared to the normal-sized mirror- so you always need to be aware that the smaller size does not mean further distance! Also I found it to be useless for night-time driving - the mirror and image are too small to easily distinguish cars in your blind-spot. I guess I would weakly recommend it. (The price is quite good also).
customer_reviews.author: Rocketiz

customer_reviews.title: Flush mount or swivel options. Reflection is good.
customer_reviews.text: So these come with 2 flat base mirrors and 2 adjustable mounts. I sat them in place and was happy with just a flat base. I was pretty satisfied that I could have used the adjustable base if I needed to. Reflection was decent, no warping or bubbling that I was kind of worried about considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: awsomeness

customer_reviews.title: Best money ever spent on my Harley
customer_reviews.text: A $6 mod that transforms my Harley. I hated the original mirrors which were both convex. You could see wide angles but no detail. So I replaced them with the flat mirrors like the police motorcycles have and it was a great improvement, with the exception of cars in my blind spot. These little mirrors fixed that, now I have both views, wide angle and normal with detail. Now I have the best total rear view possible. These mirrors blend in perfectly since they don’t have a metal edge around it.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: At first I ordered a pair of these before from a different seller, but to my disappointment the mirror fell off somewhere as I was driving. And so I ordered one from this seller and to what I remember I ordered a round one, then when I received it in my surprise they sent me the rectangle ones. And so I did not want to waste my time anymore returning it and getting a refund. Then I installed it in my car. I came to realize that the rectangle blindspot mirror is much better than the round ones. It has much more view and I loved the design!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Patrial

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror was asy to install and the product works as expected. Note: If mounting using the swivel base and not directly on the mirror, black out the unused tape backing with a magic marker or paint. This way you won't see the reflection of the writing on the unused tape backing in the rearview mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Quant

customer_reviews.title: nice size
customer_reviews.text: these are just big enough to get the job done, but not too big that they cover a large part of your mirror. I recommend coloring the back of the mirror mounting adhesive with a black sharpie so that there isn't a weird white circle reflected in your main mirror, if you choose to use the adjustable mounting option. Which I do recommend as well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gaultney

customer_reviews.title: Was great on motorcycle until it fell off only after 3 days of use.
customer_reviews.text: I put this mirror on motorcycle using adjustable install. It was great fit and very effective to minimize blindspots. Only one problem -- it fell off on a highway at speed 65 MPH after only 3 days of use. Perhaps if I did fixed install it could hold better, but in that case I'll still have a blindspots.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Kroz

customer_reviews.title: These were easy to adhere and have stayed on through some nasty ...
customer_reviews.text: I hauled a u-haul trailer across the country and wanted to make sure I had extra visibility. These were easy to adhere and have stayed on through some nasty weather, and have not budged. I continue to like having them: I can see cars in my blind spot easily now. I can't believe these aren't standard on all cars, at least on the driver's side.
customer_reviews.author: io

customer_reviews.title: Great Help!
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my Honda VTX1300 motorcycle. They are ALMOST just a bit big for the stock mirrors. I placed them to the far outside edges and adjusted from there. So far they've stuck very well and are a huge help seeing the crazy car drivers in your blind spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old cars need this
customer_reviews.text: New cars come with these, sometime on the side mirrors, sometimes digitally. But this is a great item to let you know if there’s a car incoming within your dead-spot.
customer_reviews.author: azerothforalliance

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted. They are unobtrusive and very easy to put on. I just cleaned the mirror and took off the backing and stuck it on, easy as anything. Now I don't have to crane my neck every time I want to change lanes.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Mintaka

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: I can see the blind spot better but not totally. I’m not sure what would make it better. Maybe if it was a bit larger or I need to adjust the angle. It is definitely better. It was easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: LeahS

customer_reviews.title: Fit my mirrors well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Adhered well. Who knows how long they will stay in place. Works well good vision of blind spots
customer_reviews.author: dcarter50

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: These were received earlier than anticipated and worked wonderfully. I put one on a replaced side mirror without using the swivel base. It adhered to the mirror and allows greater viewing of the traffic on the passenger side of the vehicle. I have not used the swivel base yet but will place it on my son's car in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Steve V.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Excellent visability. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I can now see all around my car without having to swivel my neck.(I still do to make 100 percent sure) It was very easy to apply and to adjust. I am putting one on my wife's van as well.
customer_reviews.author: BGreen

customer_reviews.title: A necessary item to be more aware of what's behind you.
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors help you see at a better angle and prevent accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Good product 👌
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, the fact that you can use in 2 different way, I'm using without the piece that enable to put the mirrow in way that you want.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: I can see clearly now!
customer_reviews.text: First day with new car and almost pulled out into someone.....went lQQkin' and found these!
customer_reviews.author: Lil Guy

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Good material the tape was resistant to water like rain and car wash too
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good visibility and adherence
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors work very well. I installed them without the pivot piece --- directly onto the glass. Good visibility and adherence. Eliminates blind spot.
customer_reviews.author: Monday Skipper

customer_reviews.title: My review of this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These work but they are quite small. I still physically turn my head and take a quick look before changing lanes to look for blind spots.
customer_reviews.author: NightOwl

customer_reviews.title: They work.....
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and used as extra precaution for side mirrors ...
customer_reviews.author: Carol V

customer_reviews.title: Frameless design
customer_reviews.text: I like the frameless design. The seamless appearance of glass meeting glass looks better than many alternative designs available.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Baker

customer_reviews.title: Work well and as thin as you can get. ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well and as thin as you can get. I didn't want a mirror that stuck out very far. These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: MCP

customer_reviews.title: Great for parking lines
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied. It does well to help me cover my blind spots and parking lines,especially when parking in the malls and supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: These work well. They've saved me a few times from bad lane changes
customer_reviews.author: James Dyck

customer_reviews.title: Great Help to my mirrors
customer_reviews.text: My motorcycle. I am older and it helps see what is behind me easier to see with them attached on my stock mirrors .
customer_reviews.author: ERIC HESEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Threw my money away
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it flew off on the highway. The stem that adjusts the movement broke off and took the blind spot mirror with it. just wasted $7 , I ended up getting some replacements from the .99 cent store.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: They hold great and stay where I put them
customer_reviews.text: They hold great and stay where I put them , the vibration and bumps in our Razor don't affect them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenster

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: it seems to be hold on, first try i didn't like the position but if you only softly press down it wont secure the bond and you can move it around. Press firmly and its stuck on.
customer_reviews.author: richard lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the mirrors, once I finally put them on I have enjoyed the extra caution.
customer_reviews.author: corinne rice

customer_reviews.title: great, instant mirrors
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use and easy to see. simple but perfect
customer_reviews.author: Leyden Magallanes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as stated. I like the fact that they give the option to be adjustable or not. Very clear vision.
customer_reviews.author: KernalSanders

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and it sticks on!
customer_reviews.text: Great for blind sights and it never comes off like other blind sight mirrors I bought from previous sellers. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel this is good math for my car. But nothing wrong with the product or design.
customer_reviews.author: Kods

customer_reviews.title: A small addition for greater peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: We have an older car which works beautifully but does not have the sensors to alert the driver when a car is in our blind spot. A friend had added these small mirrors to her car and liked them; we find them very helpful and installed them ourselves. This gives me greater peace of mind even though we are careful drivers. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Loved how these helped me see in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Loved how these helped me see in my blind spot. I feel so much safer driving my toddler around in my mini van once i installed these! And the adhesive is no joke! These stuck on very well. I took my car for a car wash and was afraid that id walk up to my car and find the mirror missing, but nope, they stuck on really well!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really work for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it was difficult to use. The mirrors were too small to be effective. I ended up just adjusting my rear view mirrors so I could avoid the blind spots as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Mystufff

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have it stock on my mirror for several months and so far Work's great. It went thrue several car washes and it did not detach from the mirror. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kam

customer_reviews.title: Love being provided a couple of options on how you ...
customer_reviews.text: Love being provided a couple of options on how you want it set up. Love the adjustable option, sticks well, works well. Overall love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Stefanus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product simply loved it its easy to fix
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product simply loved it its easy to fix, I use it my car and my wife's car we loved so far
customer_reviews.author: mohammed ali

product_meta.title: Zone Tech Blind Spot Adjustable Mirrors - 2-Pack Premium Quality Blind Spot Mirror Adjustable Stick-On Exterior Side Mirror for All Cars Motorcycles Trucks Snowmobiles
product_meta.description:
Zone Tech Blind Spot Adjustable Mirrors - 2-Pack Premium Quality Blind Spot Mirror Adjustable Stick-On Exterior Side Mirror for All Cars Motorcycles Trucks Snowmobiles 

► The Zone Tech Blind Spot Adjustable Mirrors are a Small Investment that will go a long while. Its Affordable price combined with its Sleek look, Safety features and premium quality make it a "Must Have" for drivers, taxicabs, carpoolers, teenagers or any car owner. The Zone Tech Blind Spot Mirrors easily mount to the original factory mirror with the Convenient stick on mounting. Although they can be placed anywhere you prefer they are typically place on the bottom outside corner of the original mirror. 

► The Zone Tech Blind Spot Mirror Helps you avoid the dreaded and tricky blind spots. Passing lanes, changing lanes, merging onto freeways or even backing and parking the Mirrors will give you the Confidence and ability to do so easily. In addition they greatly Increase Safety by reducing the possibilities of unfortunate accidents. 

 

► The Zone Tech blind spot mirror are constructed out of Premium Quality material so that they are Durable, Sturdy and Long Lasting. It has HD Glass curved male face frameless ultrathin slim design, equip with strength adhesive for pressure-sensitive tape installation. The Zone Tech blind spot mirror features a 360° Rotate + 30°Adjustabe, maximize your view with wide angle in car. Unlike the larger mirrors with the bulky black frame, the Zone Tech blind spot mirror won't take up a lot of space on the original mirror making it a most Handy car necessity. 

Zone Tech Brand is known worldwide with superior product quality and service!
feature_bullets: ► GREAT VISIBILITY - The Zone Tech blind spot mirror gives you a realistic view 3X larger and clearer than other blind spot mirrors. The Zone Tech blind spot mirror also helps you avoid the dreaded and tricky blind spots. Passing lanes, changing lanes, merging onto freeways or even backing and parking the Mirrors will give you the confidence and ability to do so easily.

► STRONG ADHESIVE - The Zone Tech blind spot mirror is equipped with super strength all weather bonding strip so you don't have to worry about the mirrors falling off. The adhesive is very strong, so it is much better to assume that once you stick it on, you can't adjust it anymore.

► SMART DESIGN- The Zone Tech blind spot mirror features a 360° rotate + 30°adjustabe, maximize your view with wide angle in car. Unlike the larger mirrors with the bulky black frame, the Zone Tech blind spot mirror won't take up a lot of space on the original mirror making it a most handy car necessity.

► PREMIUM QUALITY - The Zone Tech blind spot mirror are constructed out of premium quality material so that they are durable, sturdy and long lasting. It has HD Glass curved male face frameless ultrathin slim design, equip with strength adhesive for pressure-sensitive tape installation.

► MUST HAVE - The Zone Tech blind spot mirror is a small investment that will go a long while. Its affordable price combined with its sleek look, safety features and premium quality make it a "must have" for drivers, taxicabs, carpoolers, teenagers or any car owner.
